xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
### Missing: ring.title=Knowledge Ring Application ### Missing: ring.about=The Knowledge Ring Application allows to draw relations between wiki pages. For instance, the relation //has author// can be created to state that page //The Jungle Book// has relation //has author// with page //Rudyard Kipling//. Relations are stored in the wiki as any other page, with the only specificity that they have relation //is a// with the //Relation// page. The connections of each wiki page can be browsed using a widget showing up under each page title, allowing also to add new connections. ring.quick-links=Documentation et liens rapides ring.documentation=Documentation ring.demo=Démo ring.search=Recherche ring.administration=Administration ring.import=Import ring.types=Types ring.relations=Relations ring.filter=Filtre
# RingClass ### Missing: Ring.Code.RingClass_has-referent=Has referent ### Missing: Ring.Code.RingClass_has-relation=Has relation Ring.Code.RingClass_has-relation_hint=Relation entre cette page et d'autres pages ### Missing: Ring.Code.RingClass_has-relatum=Has relatum ### Missing: Ring.Code.RingClass_has-relatum_hint=The relatum is the second part of the relation ### Missing: Ring.Code.RingClass_has-properties=Has properties ### Missing: Ring.Code.RingClass_has-properties_hint=Properties describing this ring

# ConfigurationClass ring.settings.title=Paramètres Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_spacesIn=Espaces inclus Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_spacesIn.hint=Liste des espaces où l'application sera activée (séparateur : virgule), par exemple : Main, XWiki Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_spacesOut=Espaces exclus Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_spacesOut.hint=Liste des espaces où l'application ne sera pas activée (séparateur : virgule) Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_pagesOut=Pages exclues Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_pagesOut.hint=Liste des pages où l'application ne sera pas activée (séparateur : virgule), par exemple : Main.WebHome, XWiki.WebHome ### Missing: Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_termSheet=Term sheet ### Missing: Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_termSheet.hint=Sheet to be used to display the pages containing at least one ring
